heading: Today
text: Mostly cloudy. Chance of snow showers arriving west of Greens in the afternoon, spreading east into the evening. Highs from the upper 20s to low 30s. Light south to southwest wind.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers. Lows in the teens. Light west wind.

heading: Sunday
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers, diminishing in the afternoon. Highs from the low 20s in the north increasing to near 30 in the warmest southern valleys. Northwest wind at 5 to 10 mph.
